remarks: Separate out a term in a finite product.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
fprodsplitsn.ph $e |- F/ k ph $.
fprodsplitsn.kd $e |- F/_ k D $.
fprodsplitsn.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. Fin ) $.
fprodsplitsn.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. V ) $.
fprodsplitsn.ba $e |- ( ph -> -. B e. A ) $.
fprodsplitsn.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. A ) -> C e. CC ) $.
fprodsplitsn.d $e |- ( k = B -> C = D ) $.
fprodsplitsn.dcn $e |- ( ph -> D e. CC ) $.
fprodsplitsn $p |- ( ph -> prod_ k e. ( A u. { B } ) C = ( prod_ k e. A C x. D ) ) $.
$d A k $.
$d B k $.
$d V k $.
